description: This file defines a Flutter widget called BookCard, which displays a visual representation of a book with cover image, title, author, and a decorative corner ribbon. It includes custom painting for the ribbon and references assets such as images and theme data.

classes.name: _RibbonPainter
classes.description: A custom painter used to draw a stylized ribbon corner on the book cover, with adjustable color and shading.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the BookCard, including background textures, book cover image, and text details.

methods.name: _RibbonPainter
methods.description: Constructor for the custom painter, taking color as an input.

methods.name: paint
methods.description: Draws the corner ribbon and border lines on the canvas.

methods.name: shouldRepaint
methods.description: Determines whether the painter should repaint when the color changes.
